features: Waterproof
Windproof
Breathable
Durable
Gore-Tex three-layer construction delivers complete weather protection
Updated Gore-Tex fabric has a revised tricot backer made from dope dyed recycled yarns
Regular fit provides freedom of movement with room for layers
Articulated sleeves and gusseted underarms for mobility and comfort
Adjustable hood with front brim for full weather protection
WaterTight™ full length front zip
Adjustable cuffs with low profile snaps
Full seat coverage
Straight hem
Two hand pockets with WaterTight™ zippers
Chest pocket with WaterTight™ zip hidden under placket
Note: Our WaterTight™ zippers are highly water resistant, but not waterproof. We do not recommend keeping items in your pockets that may be damaged by moisture
Webbing hanger loop
Contains materials that meet the bluesign® criteria
Self fabric uses PFC-free DWR: PFCs are a class of chemicals used to provide highly effective water repellency to textiles, but are known to persist in the environment
Dope dyed backer
DWR(Durable Water Repellent)finish repels moisture
